title: Welcome to My Blog

Welcome to My Blog

Hey there! ðŸ‘‹ This is my very first article written in **Markdown**. --- ## Why Markdown? - It's simple - It's readable even in raw form - It's perfect for blogs --- Read this article to learn more about the basic Markdown syntax: **[Markdown Basic Syntax (Heading)](/view/article/14)** ## New Feature (24 September 2025) 12.00 PM You can now upload images and easily add them to your article â€” just use normal markdown syntax, like this: ```markdown ![alt text](image_url "optional title") ``` The app will handle everything for you automatically, so you donâ€™t need to worry about the image size. That will render clean and friendly â€” with proper Markdown code block formatting and a natural tone. ![article page](/uploads/1758690288914.jpg "Article Page")
